member.name: EC_VARIANT
member.summary: The EC_VARIANT structure contains event collector data (subscription data) or property values.

member.name: EC_VARIANT.BooleanArr
member.summary: A pointer to an array of Boolean values.

member.name: EC_VARIANT.Int32Arr
member.summary: A pointer to an array of signed 32-bit integer values.

member.name: EC_VARIANT.StringArr
member.summary: A pointer to an array of null-terminated strings.

member.name: EC_VARIANT.Count
member.summary: The number of elements (not length) in bytes. Used for arrays and binary or string types.

member.name: EC_VARIANT.Type
member.summary: The type of the data in the structure. Use a value from the enumeration to specify the type. When the type is specified, you can use any of the union members to access the actual value. For example, if the type is EcVarTypeDateTime, then the value is DateTimeVal in the EC_VARIANT structure.
